ModMetaData.name: ResearchPal - Forked (Dev)
ModMetaData.author: VinaLx
ModMetaData.description:
Forked smooth painless research # Features - Dynamically generated to maximize readability. - Shows research projects, buildings, plants and recipes unlocked by each research project. - Projects can be queued, and colonists will automatically start the next project when the current research project completes. - Search functionality to quickly find research projects.
# Credits: Original mod by Fluffy, Not Food and Skyarkangel Graph layout algorithm, quality of life update and various fixes by VinaLx. Templarr, Russian translation Suh, Junmin: Korean translation rw-chaos, German translation 53N4, Spanish translation Qux, French translation
